title: New Champion Capsules
body:
So, I really like this preseason patch with new runes and all of that , these new champion capsules that you get by leveling up ar kind of underpowered.
So, first of all I think that you should get much more out of these because ,now, these capsules are the only way to get BE in-game.
Second of all ,which is actually the main thing because I'm here, is that I just go to lvl 34 and opened my champion capsule ,but, ii only got ONE CHAMP SHARD  ({{champion:203}} ).
Riot plese tell me is this some sort of a bug or not ,but if it is not, then these capsules are s**t.

{{sticker:sg-shisa}}

replies.body:
That Kindred skin shard disenchants for about 1260 which is actually over the average of what should drop from normal leveling capsules [**per Mortdog's post**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/developer-corner/Jh3Mtzu6-blue-essence-earn-rates-learning-the-numbers-with-carl-and-henrietta)

> First, a couple baselines to get us started.
> A Leveling Capsule contains champ shards with a BE value of either 720, 900, 960, or 1,240. (The average value is 910 based on drop rates)

They're still taking feedback on the new BE systems for ways it can be improved if needed, so make sure to hit them up with your suggestions!

Hey, MitaRuma!

Riot made a post about BE essence and broke them down very well (https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/developer-corner/Jh3Mtzu6-board-post-title-blue-essence-earn-rates-learning-the-numbers-with-carl-and-henrietta)! 
I believe they are also making tweaks to it to give more Blue Essence (BE) since many players are upset. Thanks for the feedback though, it helps give the player community a voice!

Hope I helped! {{sticker:sg-kiko}}
